main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimLoanSupplementary] Script Date: 01/02/2013 17:24:24 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDimLoanSupplementary]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDimLoanSupplementary]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimLoanSupplementary] Script Date: 01/02/2013 17:24:24 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDimLoanSupplementary]( [DimLoanID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [AccountNo] [varchar](20) NOT NULL, [CrossCollateralisationFlag] [char](10) NULL, [DocumentType] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsuranceInd] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsurerCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsurerDesc] [varchar](300) NULL, [OriginalBrand] [varchar](20) NULL, [PaymentFrequency] [varchar](20) NULL, [PurposeCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [PurposeDesc] [varchar](300) NULL, [SecuritisationDealNo] [varchar](20) NULL, [MonthlyPaymentAmount] [decimal](15, 4) NULL, [PaymentAmount] [decimal](15, 2) NULL, [PendingSecuritisationNumber] [varchar](20) NULL, [UCCCRegulated] [varchar](20) NULL, [WarnCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [EnforcementFlag] [varchar](20) NULL, [LitigationFlag] [varchar](20) NULL, [ProgressiveDrawdownFlag] [varchar](20) NULL, [HardshipFlag] [varchar](1) NULL, [LastInArrearsDate] [datetime] null, [StaffIndicator] [varchar](20) NULL, [FirstHomeBuyerInd] [varchar](20) NULL, [SoldSecuritisationNo] [varchar](20) NULL, [CustomerCode] [varchar](50) NULL, [ResidentDesc] [varchar](50) NULL, [InvolvementType] [varchar](20) NULL, [Guarantee] [varchar](20) NULL, [SelfEmploymentIndicator] [varchar](12) NULL, [OffsetIndicator] [varchar](10) NULL
CONSTRAINT [PK_tblDimLoanSupplimentary] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimLoanID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
